response.overview: A Dark Comical Tale focusing on the anarchic adventures of George and Willie. Two townies that have an unhealthy appetite for alcohol and illegal drugs while trying to survive in a small town. With no hope of rehabilitation for either of them, George and Willie find themselves in a series of manic and bizarre situations which distracts both of them in their quests to find a job, love, and the meaning of life. â€”RYAN CAVALLINE
response.title: Inherited Scars
